name: Soul of Bapu
description: Soul of Bapu  This piece is dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi the "Father of a Nation" and the leader of India's independence from the British rule.  Gandhi's life was dedicated to fight against discrimination and defend the civil rights of his people through peace. His story served as a foundation that ignited peaceful civil rights movements across the world.  "The true measure of any society can be found in how it treats its most vulnerable members."  Gandhi (1869-1948)
